LYRASIS | Remote | full time developer

LYRASIS is a member-based, non-profit company providing services to and partnering with libraries, archives and museums and other cultural heritage organizations across the country and overseas.

Our mission is to create, access and manage information with an emphasis on digital content, while building and sustaining collaboration, enhancing operations and technology, and increasing buying power.

This position, the Repository Applications Developer primarily will manage and extend the LYRASIS cloud-based, open-source hosted service offerings.

If you are interested, please see/read more here: https://www.lyrasis.org/job/Pages/LYRASIS-Positions.aspx
